metadata.synopsis: The Zhent Leader arrived at the Guildhall after being bribed in the Abandoned Cistern and calls the Zhentarim to action.

0.speaker: Boss Friol
0.text: Ah, good. I was hoping it would come to this. ZHENTARIM - TO ARMS!
0.context: NodeContext: Giving up on negotiations - calling her Zhent to arms.
